channel.title: untagged on Script Adults
channel.description: Recent content in untagged on Script Adults

item.title: Test
item.description: Introduction AV and EDR use API hoooking to monitor API calls of processes. This post will take a brief look on how does a hook look like and the classic solution for malwares to bypass API hooking. I tested the content of this blog in a windows 10 VM with BitDefender installed. You can get the sample code here.
